problem_names:
lemma (in star_dioid) 
  assumes "\<And>x. 1 + x \<cdot> x\<^sup>\<star> =  x\<^sup>\<star>"
  and "\<And>x. 1 + x\<^sup>\<star> \<cdot> x =  x\<^sup>\<star>"
  and "\<And>x. x \<cdot> x = x \<Longrightarrow> x\<^sup>\<star> = 1 + x"
  shows "\<And>x y. (x + y)\<^sup>\<star> = x\<^sup>\<star> \<cdot> (y \<cdot> x\<^sup>\<star>)\<^sup>\<star>"

lemma (in star_dioid) 
  assumes "\<And>x. 1 + x \<cdot> x\<^sup>\<star> =  x\<^sup>\<star>"
  and "\<And>x. 1 + x\<^sup>\<star> \<cdot> x =  x\<^sup>\<star>"
  and "\<And>x. x \<cdot> x = x \<Longrightarrow> x\<^sup>\<star> = 1 + x"
  shows "\<And>x y. x \<le> y \<longrightarrow> x\<^sup>\<star> \<le> y\<^sup>\<star>"

lemma (in star_dioid) 
  assumes "\<And>x. 1 + x \<cdot> x\<^sup>\<star> =  x\<^sup>\<star>"
  and "\<And>x. 1 + x\<^sup>\<star> \<cdot> x =  x\<^sup>\<star>"
  and "\<And>x y. 1 + x \<le> y \<and> y \<cdot> y \<le> y \<longrightarrow> x\<^sup>\<star> \<le> y"
  shows "\<And>x. 1 + x \<le> x\<^sup>\<star>"

lemma (in star_dioid) 
  assumes "\<And>x. 1 + x \<cdot> x\<^sup>\<star> =  x\<^sup>\<star>"
  and "\<And>x. 1 + x\<^sup>\<star> \<cdot> x =  x\<^sup>\<star>"
  and "\<And>x y. 1 + x \<le> y \<and> y \<cdot> y \<le> y \<longrightarrow> x\<^sup>\<star> \<le> y"
  shows "\<And>x. x\<^sup>\<star> = (1 + x)\<^sup>\<star>"

lemma (in star_dioid) 
  assumes "\<And>x. 1 + x \<cdot> x\<^sup>\<star> =  x\<^sup>\<star>"
  and "\<And>x. 1 + x\<^sup>\<star> \<cdot> x =  x\<^sup>\<star>"
  and "\<And>x y. 1 + x + y \<cdot> y \<le> y \<Longrightarrow> x\<^sup>\<star> \<le> y"
  shows "\<And>x. x\<^sup>\<star> \<cdot> x\<^sup>\<star> \<le> x\<^sup>\<star>"

lemma (in star_dioid) 
  assumes "\<And>x. 1 + x \<cdot> x\<^sup>\<star> =  x\<^sup>\<star>"
  and "\<And>x. 1 + x\<^sup>\<star> \<cdot> x =  x\<^sup>\<star>"
  and "\<And>x y z. x \<cdot> y = y \<cdot> z \<Longrightarrow> x\<^sup>\<star> \<cdot> y = y \<cdot> z\<^sup>\<star>"
  shows "1\<^sup>\<star> = 1"

lemma (in star_dioid) 
  assumes "\<And>x. 1 + x \<cdot> x\<^sup>\<star> =  x\<^sup>\<star>"
  and "\<And>x. 1 + x\<^sup>\<star> \<cdot> x =  x\<^sup>\<star>"
  and "\<And>x y z. x \<cdot> y \<le> y \<cdot> z \<Longrightarrow> x\<^sup>\<star> \<cdot> y \<le> y \<cdot> z\<^sup>\<star>"
  and "\<And>x y z. y \<cdot> x \<le> z \<cdot> y \<Longrightarrow> y \<cdot> x\<^sup>\<star> \<le> z\<^sup>\<star> \<cdot> y"
  shows "1\<^sup>\<star> = 1"

lemma (in star_dioid) 
  assumes "\<And>x. 1 + x \<cdot> x\<^sup>\<star> =  x\<^sup>\<star>"
  and "\<And>x. 1 + x\<^sup>\<star> \<cdot> x =  x\<^sup>\<star>"
  and "\<And>x y. x = y \<cdot> x \<Longrightarrow> x = y\<^sup>\<star> \<cdot> x"
  and "\<And>x y. x = x \<cdot> y \<Longrightarrow> x = x \<cdot> y\<^sup>\<star>"
  shows "\<And>x y. y \<cdot> x \<le> y \<Longrightarrow> y \<cdot> x\<^sup>\<star> \<le> y"
translations:
lemma (in star_dioid) 
  assumes "\<And>x. 1 + x \<cdot> x\<^sup>\<star> =  x\<^sup>\<star>"
  and "\<And>x. 1 + x\<^sup>\<star> \<cdot> x =  x\<^sup>\<star>"
  and "\<And>x. x \<cdot> x = x \<Longrightarrow> x\<^sup>\<star> = 1 + x"
  shows "\<And>x y. (x + y)\<^sup>\<star> = x\<^sup>\<star> \<cdot> (y \<cdot> x\<^sup>\<star>)\<^sup>\<star>"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x y.
       (x + y)\<^sup>\<star> =
       x\<^sup>\<star> \<cdot> (y \<cdot> x\<^sup>\<star>)\<^sup>\<star>

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x y.
       (x + y)\<^sup>\<star> =
       x\<^sup>\<star> \<cdot> (y \<cdot> x\<^sup>\<star>)\<^sup>\<star>

lemma (in star_dioid) 
  assumes "\<And>x. 1 + x \<cdot> x\<^sup>\<star> =  x\<^sup>\<star>"
  and "\<And>x. 1 + x\<^sup>\<star> \<cdot> x =  x\<^sup>\<star>"
  and "\<And>x. x \<cdot> x = x \<Longrightarrow> x\<^sup>\<star> = 1 + x"
  shows "\<And>x y. x \<le> y \<longrightarrow> x\<^sup>\<star> \<le> y\<^sup>\<star>"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x y.
       x \<le> y \<longrightarrow> x\<^sup>\<star> \<le> y\<^sup>\<star>

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x y.
       x \<le> y \<longrightarrow> x\<^sup>\<star> \<le> y\<^sup>\<star>

lemma (in star_dioid) 
  assumes "\<And>x. 1 + x \<cdot> x\<^sup>\<star> =  x\<^sup>\<star>"
  and "\<And>x. 1 + x\<^sup>\<star> \<cdot> x =  x\<^sup>\<star>"
  and "\<And>x y. 1 + x \<le> y \<and> y \<cdot> y \<le> y \<longrightarrow> x\<^sup>\<star> \<le> y"
  shows "\<And>x. 1 + x \<le> x\<^sup>\<star>"

lemma (in star_dioid) 
  assumes "\<And>x. 1 + x \<cdot> x\<^sup>\<star> =  x\<^sup>\<star>"
  and "\<And>x. 1 + x\<^sup>\<star> \<cdot> x =  x\<^sup>\<star>"
  and "\<And>x y. 1 + x \<le> y \<and> y \<cdot> y \<le> y \<longrightarrow> x\<^sup>\<star> \<le> y"
  shows "\<And>x. x\<^sup>\<star> = (1 + x)\<^sup>\<star>"

lemma (in star_dioid) 
  assumes "\<And>x. 1 + x \<cdot> x\<^sup>\<star> =  x\<^sup>\<star>"
  and "\<And>x. 1 + x\<^sup>\<star> \<cdot> x =  x\<^sup>\<star>"
  and "\<And>x y. 1 + x + y \<cdot> y \<le> y \<Longrightarrow> x\<^sup>\<star> \<le> y"
  shows "\<And>x. x\<^sup>\<star> \<cdot> x\<^sup>\<star> \<le> x\<^sup>\<star>"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x. x\<^sup>\<star> \<cdot> x\<^sup>\<star> \<le> x\<^sup>\<star>

lemma (in star_dioid) 
  assumes "\<And>x. 1 + x \<cdot> x\<^sup>\<star> =  x\<^sup>\<star>"
  and "\<And>x. 1 + x\<^sup>\<star> \<cdot> x =  x\<^sup>\<star>"
  and "\<And>x y z. x \<cdot> y = y \<cdot> z \<Longrightarrow> x\<^sup>\<star> \<cdot> y = y \<cdot> z\<^sup>\<star>"
  shows "1\<^sup>\<star> = 1"

lemma (in star_dioid) 
  assumes "\<And>x. 1 + x \<cdot> x\<^sup>\<star> =  x\<^sup>\<star>"
  and "\<And>x. 1 + x\<^sup>\<star> \<cdot> x =  x\<^sup>\<star>"
  and "\<And>x y z. x \<cdot> y \<le> y \<cdot> z \<Longrightarrow> x\<^sup>\<star> \<cdot> y \<le> y \<cdot> z\<^sup>\<star>"
  and "\<And>x y z. y \<cdot> x \<le> z \<cdot> y \<Longrightarrow> y \<cdot> x\<^sup>\<star> \<le> z\<^sup>\<star> \<cdot> y"
  shows "1\<^sup>\<star> = 1"

lemma (in star_dioid) 
  assumes "\<And>x. 1 + x \<cdot> x\<^sup>\<star> =  x\<^sup>\<star>"
  and "\<And>x. 1 + x\<^sup>\<star> \<cdot> x =  x\<^sup>\<star>"
  and "\<And>x y. x = y \<cdot> x \<Longrightarrow> x = y\<^sup>\<star> \<cdot> x"
  and "\<And>x y. x = x \<cdot> y \<Longrightarrow> x = x \<cdot> y\<^sup>\<star>"
  shows "\<And>x y. y \<cdot> x \<le> y \<Longrightarrow> y \<cdot> x\<^sup>\<star> \<le> y"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x y.
       y \<cdot> x \<le> y \<Longrightarrow>
       y \<cdot> x\<^sup>\<star> \<le> y

class C3l_var = conway_dioid +
  assumes C3l_var: "z + x \<cdot> y \<le> y \<Longrightarrow> x\<^sup>\<star> \<cdot> z \<le> y"

class C3r_var = conway_dioid +
  assumes C3r_var: "z + y \<cdot> x \<le> y \<Longrightarrow> z \<cdot> x\<^sup>\<star> \<le> y"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x y.
       x \<cdot> y \<le> y \<Longrightarrow>
       x\<^sup>\<star> \<cdot> y \<le> y

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>y x.
       y \<cdot> x \<le> y \<Longrightarrow>
       y \<cdot> x\<^sup>\<star> \<le> y

class Brtc_algebra = star_dioid +
  assumes rtc1: "1 + x\<^sup>\<star> \<cdot> x\<^sup>\<star> + x \<le> x\<^sup>\<star>"
  and rtc2: "1 + x + y \<cdot> y \<le> y \<Longrightarrow> x\<^sup>\<star> \<le> y"

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x.
       (1::'a) + x\<^sup>\<star> \<cdot> x\<^sup>\<star> + x
       \<le> x\<^sup>\<star>
 2. \<And>x y.
       (1::'a) + x + y \<cdot> y \<le> y \<Longrightarrow>
       x\<^sup>\<star> \<le> y

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x.
       (1::'a) + x\<^sup>\<star> \<cdot> x\<^sup>\<star> + x
       \<le> x\<^sup>\<star>
 2. \<And>x y.
       (1::'a) + x + y \<cdot> y \<le> y \<Longrightarrow>
       x\<^sup>\<star> \<le> y

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (1::'a) + x\<^sup>\<star> \<cdot> x\<^sup>\<star> + x
    \<le> x\<^sup>\<star>

proof (state)
this:
  (1::'a) + x\<^sup>\<star> \<cdot> x\<^sup>\<star> + x
  \<le> x\<^sup>\<star>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x y.
       (1::'a) + x + y \<cdot> y \<le> y \<Longrightarrow>
       x\<^sup>\<star> \<le> y
show "1 + x + y \<cdot> y \<le> y \<Longrightarrow> x\<^sup>\<star> \<le> y"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (1::'a) + x + y \<cdot> y \<le> y \<Longrightarrow>
    x\<^sup>\<star> \<le> y
by (metis B23 local.join.le_sup_iff eq_iff mult_1_right subdistl)

proof (state)
this:
  (1::'a) + x + y \<cdot> y \<le> y \<Longrightarrow>
  x\<^sup>\<star> \<le> y

goal:
No subgoals!

proof (state)
goal (3 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x. (1::'a) + x \<le> x\<^sup>\<star>
 2. \<And>x. x\<^sup>\<star> \<cdot> x\<^sup>\<star> = x\<^sup>\<star>
 3. \<And>x y.
       \<lbrakk>(1::'a) + x \<le> y; y \<cdot> y = y\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> x\<^sup>\<star> \<le> y

proof (state)
goal (3 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x. (1::'a) + x \<le> x\<^sup>\<star>
 2. \<And>x. x\<^sup>\<star> \<cdot> x\<^sup>\<star> = x\<^sup>\<star>
 3. \<And>x y.
       \<lbrakk>(1::'a) + x \<le> y; y \<cdot> y = y\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> x\<^sup>\<star> \<le> y

proof (state)
this:
  (1::'a) + x \<le> x\<^sup>\<star>

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x. x\<^sup>\<star> \<cdot> x\<^sup>\<star> = x\<^sup>\<star>
 2. \<And>x y.
       \<lbrakk>(1::'a) + x \<le> y; y \<cdot> y = y\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> x\<^sup>\<star> \<le> y

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x\<^sup>\<star> \<cdot> x\<^sup>\<star> = x\<^sup>\<star>

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. x\<^sup>\<star> \<cdot> x\<^sup>\<star> \<le> x\<^sup>\<star>
 2. x\<^sup>\<star> \<le> x\<^sup>\<star> \<cdot> x\<^sup>\<star>

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x\<^sup>\<star> \<cdot> x\<^sup>\<star> \<le> x\<^sup>\<star>

proof (state)
this:
  x\<^sup>\<star> \<cdot> x\<^sup>\<star> \<le> x\<^sup>\<star>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x\<^sup>\<star> \<le> x\<^sup>\<star> \<cdot> x\<^sup>\<star>

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x\<^sup>\<star> \<le> x\<^sup>\<star> \<cdot> x\<^sup>\<star>
by (metis rtc1 add.commute join.le_sup_iff less_eq_def mult_isor mult_onel)

proof (state)
this:
  x\<^sup>\<star> \<le> x\<^sup>\<star> \<cdot> x\<^sup>\<star>

goal:
No subgoals!

proof (state)
this:
  x\<^sup>\<star> \<cdot> x\<^sup>\<star> = x\<^sup>\<star>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x y.
       \<lbrakk>(1::'a) + x \<le> y; y \<cdot> y = y\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> x\<^sup>\<star> \<le> y
show "\<lbrakk> 1 + x \<le> y; y \<cdot> y = y \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> x\<^sup>\<star> \<le> y"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>(1::'a) + x \<le> y; y \<cdot> y = y\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> x\<^sup>\<star> \<le> y

proof (state)
this:
  \<lbrakk>(1::'a) + x \<le> y; y \<cdot> y = y\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> x\<^sup>\<star> \<le> y

goal:
No subgoals!

class wB1_algebra = conway_dioid +
  assumes wR: "x \<cdot> x \<le> x \<Longrightarrow> x\<^sup>\<star> = 1 + x"
by (metis C11_var R add_idem' mult_onel mult_oner)

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x.
       x \<cdot> x \<le> x \<Longrightarrow> x\<^sup>\<star> = (1::'a) + x

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x.
       x \<cdot> x \<le> x \<Longrightarrow> x\<^sup>\<star> = (1::'a) + x

proof (state)
this:
  x \<cdot> x \<le> x

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x.
       x \<cdot> x \<le> x \<Longrightarrow> x\<^sup>\<star> = (1::'a) + x

proof (prove)
using this:
  x \<cdot> x \<le> x

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x \<cdot> ((1::'a) + x) = x

proof (state)
this:
  x \<cdot> ((1::'a) + x) = x

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x.
       x \<cdot> x \<le> x \<Longrightarrow> x\<^sup>\<star> = (1::'a) + x

proof (prove)
using this:
  x \<cdot> ((1::'a) + x) = x

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ((1::'a) + x) \<cdot> ((1::'a) + x) = (1::'a) + x

proof (prove)
using this:
  x \<cdot> ((1::'a) + x) = x
  ?b + (?a + ?c) = ?a + (?b + ?c)
  (?x + ?y) \<cdot> ?z = ?x \<cdot> ?z + ?y \<cdot> ?z

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ((1::'a) + x) \<cdot> ((1::'a) + x) = (1::'a) + x

proof (state)
this:
  ((1::'a) + x) \<cdot> ((1::'a) + x) = (1::'a) + x

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x.
       x \<cdot> x \<le> x \<Longrightarrow> x\<^sup>\<star> = (1::'a) + x

proof (prove)
using this:
  ((1::'a) + x) \<cdot> ((1::'a) + x) = (1::'a) + x

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x\<^sup>\<star> = (1::'a) + x

proof (state)
this:
  x\<^sup>\<star> = (1::'a) + x

goal:
No subgoals!
